tum.betriebsysteme.kostadinov.btframework.sdp
Class SDPRegister

java.lang.Object
  tum.betriebsysteme.kostadinov.btframework.sdp.SDPRegister

public class SDPRegister
extends java.lang.Object

The SDP component is responsible for deploying the compiled executable and running it from the console. There only two functions supported - for adding the service record to the registry of the SDP server (registerHID) and deleting the same record from the registry. (unregisterHID)

Author:
Nikolay Kostadinov

Nested Class Summary
static interface SDPRegister.SDPStateListener
          Listener will return a code describing whether the register or unregister asynchronous call succeeded.
 
Field Summary
static int CODE_CONNECTION_TO_SDP_FAILED
          Error code, connection to the local SDP server could not be established.
static int CODE_EXECUTABLE_INVALID_COMMAND_PARAMS_ENTERED
          Error code, invalid commands or parameters are passed to the executable when running.
static int CODE_EXECUTALBE_DEPLOING_FAILED
          Error code, deploying the executable to the phone's internal memory failed.
static int CODE_OS_COMMAND_ERROR
          Error code, the commands passed to the console returned an error.
static int CODE_SDP_RECORD_REQUEST_FAILED
          Error code, the service record is not in the SDP server.
static int CODE_SDP_REGISTRATION_FAILED
          Error code, the service record could not be added in the SDP server's registry.
static int CODE_SDP_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS
          Code for registration success, the service record is added in the SDP server's registry.
static int CODE_SDP_UNREGISTER_FAILED
          Error code, the service record could not be deleted from the SDP server's registry.
static int CODE_SDP_UNREGISTRATION_SUCCESS
          Code for unregistration success, the service record is removed from the SDP server's registry.
static int SDP_CONFIG_MOUSE_ABSOLUTE
          Pass to the register function in order to register a service for pointer and mouse.
static int SDP_CONFIG_MOUSE_RELATIVE
          Pass to the register function in order to register a service for mouse and keyboard.

CODE_CONNECTION_TO_SDP_FAILED

public static final int CODE_CONNECTION_TO_SDP_FAILED
Error code, connection to the local SDP server could not be established. Probably, the phone has modified Bluetooth stack. (Usually the case with HTC)

Constructor Detail

SDPRegister

public SDPRegister(Context context,
                   SDPRegister.SDPStateListener sdpStateListener)
Instantiating the SDP component.

Parameters:
context - An instance of the application context.
sdpStateListener - The state listener will report for results after register and unregister asynchronous calls.
Method Detail

isSuccess

public static boolean isSuccess(int state)
Check if a state is success or error.

Parameters:
state - pass a state to check
Returns:
true if the code is for success and false if it is error.

registerHID

public void registerHID(int recordType)
Attempts to register the new service record. Call is asynchronous and runs in a separate Thread. Result will be sent by the SDPStateListener.

Parameters:
recordType - the type of record to add. Either SDP_CONFIG_MOUSE_RELATIVE for mouse + keyboard or SDP_CONFIG_MOUSE_ABSOLUTE for pointer + keyboard.

unregisterHID

public void unregisterHID()
Attempts to delete the service record, which was previously registered. Call is asynchronous and runs in a separate Thread. Result will be delivered by the SDPStateListener. Will do nothing if the registerHID call was not successful.
